trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: La classe WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs viene utilizzata per fornire i valori dell'evento per il **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventi e che consente di specificare un'identità Windows personalizzata per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>costruisce un oggetto WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs utilizzando l'identità di Windows fornita da IIS e corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs fornito per il **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>proprietà durante il **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, l'identità fornita da IIS viene utilizzato come identità per la richiesta corrente di Windows.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se IIS utilizza l'autenticazione anonima, la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>proprietà è impostata per l'identità restituita dal <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: Il **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento viene generato solo quando l'autenticazione <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>è impostato su <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>è un modulo HTTP attivo per l'applicazione.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>costruisce una <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>utilizzando l'identità di Windows fornita da IIS e corrente dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto identità di Windows.

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> oggetto per la richiesta HTTP corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>fornisce l'accesso a <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>oggetti per la richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> oggetto per la richiesta HTTP corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'identità Windows passata per il <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>costruisce una <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>utilizzando l'identità di Windows fornita da IIS e corrente dell'oggetto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e lo passa al **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, the Identity property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se IIS utilizza l'autenticazione anonima, la proprietà Identity è impostata per l'identità restituita dal <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity passed to the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> constructor.
trans-unit.target: L'identità Windows passata per il <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs"> </xref> costruttore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto da associare con la richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà dell'utente per impostare il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>su un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se non si specifica un valore per la proprietà dell'utente durante la **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, il Windows identità fornita da IIS viene utilizzato come identità per la richiesta corrente.

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se IIS utilizza l'autenticazione anonima, la <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>proprietà è impostata per l'identità restituita dal <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>oggetto da associare con la richiesta corrente.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
